results.original_title: 劇場版「鬼滅の刃」無限列車編
results.overview: Tanjirō Kamado, joined with Inosuke Hashibira, a boy raised by boars who wears a boar's head, and Zenitsu Agatsuma, a scared boy who reveals his true power when he sleeps, boards the Infinity Train on a new mission with the Fire Hashira, Kyōjurō Rengoku, to defeat a demon who has been tormenting the people and killing the demon slayers who oppose it!
results.title: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Movie: Mugen Train

results.original_title: 鬼滅の刃 鼓屋敷編
results.overview: Tanjiro ventures to the south-southeast where he encounters a cowardly young man named Zenitsu Agatsuma. He is a fellow survivor from Final Selection and his sparrow asks Tanjiro to help keep him in line.
results.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Tsuzumi Mansion Arc

results.original_title: 鬼滅の刃 那田蜘蛛山編
results.overview: Tanjiro, now a registered Demon Slayer, teams up with fellow slayers Zenitsu and Inosuke to investigate missing person cases on the mountain Natagumo. After the group is split up during a fight with possessed swordfighters, they slowly begin to realize the entire mountain is being controlled by a family of Demon spider creatures.  A recap film of Kimetsu no Yaiba, covering episodes 15-21 with some new footage and special ending credits.
results.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Mt. Natagumo Arc

results.original_title: 「鬼滅の刃」オーケストラコンサート~鬼滅の奏~
results.overview: Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra live Kimetsu no Yaiba concert
results.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba Orchestra Concert

results.overview: Tanjiro ventures to Asakusa, Tokyo for his second mission with the Demon Slayer Corps.
results.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Asakusa Arc

results.original_title: 鬼滅の刃 柱合会議・蝶屋敷編
results.overview: Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko have been apprehended by the Demon Slayer Hashira, a group of extremely skilled swordfighters. Tanjiro undergoes trial for violating the Demon Slayer code, specifically smuggling Nezuko, a Demon, onto Mt. Natagumo. A recap film of Kimetsu no Yaiba, covering episodes 22-26 with some new footage and special ending credits.
results.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba the Hashira Meeting Arc

results.original_title: 鬼滅の刃 兄妹の絆
results.overview: Tanjiro finds his family slaughtered and the lone survivor, his sister Nezuko Kamado, turned into a Demon. To his surprise, however, Nezuko still shows signs of human emotion and thought. Thus begins Tanjiro's journey to seek out the Demon who killed their family and turn his sister human again. A recap film of Kimetsu no Yaiba, covering episodes 1-5 with extra footage.
results.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Sibling's Bond
